div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2095 Scornavacche, 30 km. NE of Cama- rina, 1949 Burial: c. 405-400 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 27 AR. Pot hoard, intact Tetradr. Rhegium: 1 Acragas: 1 Camarina: 5 (c. 415-405 B.C., Jenkins) Catana: 4 (incl. facing hd., c. 405 B.C., Jenkins) Gela: 2 Messana: 4 Naxus: 1 Selinus: 1 Syracuse:5 (to Tudeer 42) Athens: 3 (5th cent.) Disposition: Syracuse Gentili, AIIN 1954, p. 166; 1955, pp. 63-71, illus. Currò Pisanò AIIN 1962-4, pp. 228-9, 239 Jenkins, Gela, p. 158
